name: Diver Choice
description:
Ever wonder what if you find a lot of treasure chest? Underwater? Well, search no more, in this game you will be playing a diver who will be opening a lot of treasure chest with 3 other friend. Who got the most gold after several dive? But beware, half of them is explosive.

Featuring:

+A simple choice - Do you keep opening chest, or do you yield to your greed .

+Colorful boms - 5 different bomb to remember.                                                 

+Fast game - A quick game that have high replayability.
